text: Esther Morales Ayma de Willacarani (13 November 1949 â€“ 16 August 2020) was a Bolivian businesswoman. In 2006, she was made First Lady of Bolivia by her younger brother, then-President of Bolivia Evo Morales, who was unmarried. Morales died from problems caused by COVID-19 on 16 August 2020, at a Oruro, Bolivia hospital at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bolivia Category:Bolivian businesspeople Category:First Ladies
title: Esther Morales
